#summary A list of third-party Spam Karma plugins
#labels plugins

= Plugins =

Some people have provided third-party plugins that extend the abilities of Spam Karma.  The following can be downloaded from their respected web pages:

  * [http://www.sebbi.de/archives/2006/01/31/spam-karma-2-akismet-plugin/ Akismet plugin] -- by Sebastian Herp -- Uses the [http://akismet.com/ Akismet] anti-spam system as just one of the tests within Spam Karma
  * [http://blog.ftwr.co.uk/wordpress/sk2-simple-digest-plugin/ Simple Digest plugin] -- (included in Spam Karma download) by Peter Westwood -- Sends the blog admin digest emails about recent activity by Spam Karma
  * [http://blog.ftwr.co.uk/wordpress/sk2-moderate-plugin/ Moderate plugin] -- by Peter Westwood -- Forces all comments through moderation, regardless of "karma" score.

Also note that some of the plugins included in the main Spam Karma download were created by third parties.  These are:

  * Simple Digest plugin -- by Peter Westwood
  * RBL Check plugin -- by James Seward
